title: Sacramento Shooting: At least 5 people fired guns during gang-related shooting downtown, police say - KCRA Sacramento
content:
1. Sacramento Shooting: At least 5 people fired guns during gang-related shooting downtown, police say  KCRA Sacramento
  2. Sacramento Mass Shooting | Evidence shows at least 5 shooters involved in gang gunfight  ABC10
  3. KCRA Today: 5 people fired guns in Sacramento shooting, Ukraine seeks arms, new homeless shelter measure  KCRA Sacramento
  4. Op-Ed: The Sacramento shooting escalated American violence. We know how to shut it down again  Los Angeles Times
  5. Sacramento mass shooting suspect released from prison early weeks before tragedy, has violent past  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: At least five shooters fired guns during a gang-related gunbattle in downtown Sacramento Sunday that killed six people and injured 12 others, police said on Wednesday.
